title: And the grand prize for hitting level 40 is...
body:
...an emote shard that costs 2500 BE to unlock!

https://image.ibb.co/bHerOR/stupidemoteisstupid.png

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

It isn't even a very cool-looking emote...
